Pandemics Initially Spread Among People of Higher (Not Lower) Social Status

stories.text: I think it’s highly laughable no one has come to this conclusion so far, and moreover, that there tries to be an explanation beyond this… there is not some value here or even any joke value, it’s just money laundering. In many cases, these transfers are the front for a drug transaction or arms.  It’s confusing why this angle is not being covered when it’s full-stop the entirety of all reasons behind these transactions, which are in essence, merely used to hide the actual transaction being performed.
stories.title: NFT(s) are just money laundering
Quadratic algorithms are slow (and hashmaps are fast)
SquirrelMapper: Measure Evolution in Your Backyard

stories.text:
In the spirit of the "How Do You Learn?" thread - what are you favorite examples of well done textbooks/pedagogical material, in any subject?

Looking for works that people believe weaves natural narrative with explicit "learning material" in the best way. It could be entertainment, quality of writing, organization - I suppose there is no limit to the strategy of making new material both accessible and smooth. Feynman~ish comes to mind here!
stories.title: Ask HN: Best pedagogical material on any subject matter?
